statements: UPDATE audience_data SET age = 25, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE audience_data SET interests = 'Technology, Music' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE audience_data SET age = 25, gender = 'Female' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE audience_data SET gender = 'Male', interests = 'Sports, Music' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE audience_data SET age = 30, name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE video_recommendations SET recommendation = 'Best Action Movie' WHERE user_id = 10
UPDATE audience_data SET interests='sports, music' WHERE id=1
UPDATE video_recommendations SET recommendation='Action, Comedy' WHERE user_id=10
UPDATE AudienceData SET age = 25, gender = 'Male', interests = ARRAY['sports', 'music'], location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-abcd-123456789abc';
UPDATE VideoRecommendations SET rating = 4.5, category = 'Comedy', length = 120, title = 'Funny Video' WHERE video_id = 'd4e5f6g7-5678-9012-defg-234567890def';
UPDATE AudienceData SET age = 25, gender = 'Male', interests = ARRAY['Sports', 'Movies'], location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6';
UPDATE VideoRecommendations SET rating = 4.5, category = 'Thriller', length = 120, title = 'The Dark Knight' WHERE video_id = 'b1c2d3e4-f5g6-7h8i-9j0k-1l2m3n4o5';
UPDATE Audience SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE audience_id = 1;
UPDATE Recommendations SET timestamp = '2021-09-15 10:30:00', audience_id = 2 WHERE video_id = 5;
UPDATE Audience SET age = 25, location = 'New York' WHERE audience_id = 1;
UPDATE Interactions SET interaction_type = 'like', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE audience_id = 2 AND video_id = 5;
UPDATE audience_segment SET segment_name='New Segment Name' WHERE segment_id=1;
UPDATE user_profile SET age=30, gender='Male' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE audience_segment SET segment_description = 'Updated description' WHERE segment_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 5;
